-- retrievePrjErpPrptSearchInfo 실적 지적재산권 목록 조회 SELECT A.WBS_CODE as "wbsCode" /*WBS코드*/ , A.PAT_NO as "patNo" /*출원번호*/ , A.PA_HNAME as "paHname" /*출원명*/ , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.PAT_DATE,'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') as "patDate" /*출원일*/ , A.REG_NO as "regNo" /*등록번호*/ , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.REG_DATE,'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') as "regDate" /*등록일*/ , A.STATUS_NAME as "statusName" /*상태명*/ , A.EMP_HNAME as "empHname" /*발행자*/ , (CASE WHEN A.COUNTRY_CODE = 'KR' THEN 'X' ELSE 'O' END) as "krOx" FROM IPIMS_DATA A WHERE A.WBS_CODE = #{wbsCd} AND A.PAT_NO IS NOT NULL
AND A.PAT_DATE LIKE REPLACE(#{searchMonth}, '-', '') ||'%'
ORDER BY A.PAT_DATE DESC, A.PAT_NO DESC

-- retrievePrjErpPrptByYearList 년도별 실적 지적재산권 출원개수 조회 쿼리 SELECT A.WBS_CODE as "wbsCode" /*WBS코드*/ , SUBSTR(A.PAT_DATE,0,4) as "patYear" /*출원년도*/ , COUNT(A.PAT_DATE) as "patCnt" /*년도별출원개수*/ FROM IPIMS_DATA A WHERE A.WBS_CODE = #{wbsCd} AND A.PAT_NO IS NOT NULL
AND A.PAT_DATE LIKE REPLACE(#{searchYear}, '-', '') ||'%'
GROUP BY A.WBS_CODE, SUBSTR(A.PAT_DATE,0,4) ORDER BY SUBSTR(A.PAT_DATE,0,4)
